name: Wesley Hinkle
summary: Software Developer with 25 years experience in designing and developing scalable, efficient, and secure software applications. Bottom-up systems thinker. Capable of working with a range of programming languages with expertise in OOP, RESTful APIs, and data modeling. Skilled in using tools for version control and collaboration. Strong understanding of software design principles, including SOLID principles, design patterns, and UML. Experienced with relational databases, including MySQL, Microsoft SQL Server. Very proficient in SQL, as well as shell scripts.

experience.title: Software Engineer / Developer

Built and maintained application APIs for mobile apps, including integration with BAC.
Engineered data integration processes using shell scripts and SQL, handling imports from flat files, CSVs, and relational databases.
Led data modeling efforts for employer union remittances, dues collection, and ACH transactions.
Managed and maintained GitLab, initially setting it up from source and later transitioning to Omnibus, including a migration from MySQL to PostgreSQL.
Established and optimized build pipelines for multiple applications, ensuring reliable deployments.
Integrated WordPress with PHP frameworks while implementing version control strategies.
Designed and enforced Git workflows and a structured release tag schema.
Developed a system of shell scripts to automate application tasks via cron jobs.
Mentored developers in coding best practices, software architecture, and maintainability.
Refactored and untangled legacy codebases, advocating for clean, modular, and maintainable code.
